The photo was shared on Facebook on June: 2016, along with a misleading caption about newly issued 200,000 Indonesian rupiah banknotes.
Polo Ralph Lauren Indonesia confirmed in: not real currency, and explained that the design was made to resemble Indonesian banknotes but does not contain any copyrighted elements.
Bank Indonesia: the country's central bank, tweeted in April 2016 that they had not issued the vouchers seen in the misleading posts, further verifying that the claim of newly issued 200,000 rupiah banknotes was false.
